name: multi-agent-chat
description: Multi-Agent Chatbot System using Ollama LLMs

scripts.start: concurrently --names "MANAGER,MISTRAL,LLAMA3,PHI3" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start-manager" "npm run start-agent-mistral" "npm run start-agent-llama3" "npm run start-agent-phi3"
scripts.start-all: concurrently --names "MANAGER,MISTRAL,LLAMA3,PHI3" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start-manager" "npm run start-agent-mistral" "npm run start-agent-llama3" "npm run start-agent-phi3"
